summary: Four battle-weary Crusaders take on a mission to track down the evil predator who has abducted all the men and children from a devastated village.
cast: Christopher Dane|Hadrian Howard|Fergal Coghlan|Glenn Speers|Alex Childs|Kristian Nairn|Jessica Blake|Clare Bateman-King|Ella Bateman-King|Harry Bateman-King|Rod Hughes|Ryan Masher|Habib Nasib Nader|Anah Ruddin|William Stagg|Paul Terry|Nathan Webb
title: The Four Warriors
